data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Achterberg, Cornelis van, Quicke, Donald L. J., Boring, C. Andrew (2017): A revision of the tribe Planitorini van Achterberg (Hymenoptera, Braconidae, Euphorinae), with description of a new genus from Australia. ZooKeys 718: 35-64, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.718.21151, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.718.21151
